hero.name: Sławek
hero.description: I have been working in the IT industry for 25 years, gaining experience in various roles. Currently, I am passionately developing my skills in the field of ML/AI, aiming to create innovative and valuable solutions in this area.

about.title: Professional Profile.
about.paragraph1: I am a certified Scrum Master (PSM I, PSM II) and a software quality engineer (ISTQB Certified Tester – Foundation and Advanced Level, Technical Test Analyst).
about.paragraph2: Over the years, I have gained experience in programming, business and systems analysis, experimentation, and learning from mistakes in the spirit of Agile, as well as in continuous improvement (Plan-Do-Check-Act), process visualization, and optimization based on the Lean approach. A focus on quality and a holistic perspective have enabled me to create valuable solutions across various IT domains and industries.
about.paragraph3: I have always been committed to developing my professional skills and broadening my horizons. My openness, curiosity, and passion for learning have led me to consolidate all my acquired skills and apply them in the field of machine learning and artificial intelligence. I am currently intensively developing in this area, ready to leverage my experience to create innovative and valuable ML/AI solutions in a new professional role.
about.paragraph4: I believe that the competencies I have acquired – so essential in the ML/AI domain – can effectively support the implementation of ML/AI projects, helping businesses achieve ambitious goals.
